title: Affirmative Action: Against
description: Why college admissions should be colorblind. The U.S. Supreme Court will soon rule on the latest affirmative action case. Last […]
contentencoded:
Why college admissions should be colorblind. The U.S. Supreme Court will soon rule on the latest affirmative action case. Last week we heard from a proponent of affirmative action. This week, the other side.


Guest: Roger Clegg, President and General Counsel, Center for Equal Opportunity.
